verses.verse: Moreover <S%H3254><s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H5375>continued<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
As <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> who hath taken <S%H5493>away<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> who hath <S%H4843>vexed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5750>while<s%> my <S%H5397>breath<s%> is in me, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is in my <S%H639>nostrils;<s%>
My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness,<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1897>utter<s%> <S%H7423>deceit.<s%>

God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> <S%H518>that<s%> I should <S%H6663>justify<s%> you: <S%H5704>till<s%> I <S%H1478>die<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> mine <S%H8538>integrity<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.

My <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> I hold <S%H2388>fast,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> let it <S%H7503>go:<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me so long as I <S%H4480>live.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
Let mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he that riseth up <S%H6965>against<s%> me as the <S%H5767>unrighteous.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H2611>hypocrite,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> he hath <S%H1214>gained,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> taketh <S%H7953>away<s%> his <S%H5315>soul?<s%>
Will <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6818>cry<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6869>trouble<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him?
Will he delight <S%H6026>himself<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty?<s%> will he <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H6256><s%> call <S%H7121>upon<s%> <S%H433>God?<s%>
I will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H410>God:<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> will I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>conceal.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H859>yourselves<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> it; <S%H4100>why<s%> then are ye <S%H2088>thus<s%> <S%H1892>altogether<s%> <S%H1891>vain?<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of <S%H6184>oppressors,<s%> which they shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H4480>Almighty.<s%> <S%H7706><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> it is <S%H3926>for<s%> the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and his <S%H6631>offspring<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
Those that <S%H8300>remain<s%> of him shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H4194>death:<s%> and his <S%H490>widows<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> he heap <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H4403>raiment<s%> as the <S%H2563>clay;<s%>
He may <S%H3559>prepare<s%> it, but the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall put it <S%H3847>on,<s%> and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
He <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> as a <S%H6211>moth,<s%> and as a <S%H5521>booth<s%> that the <S%H5341>keeper<s%> <S%H6213>maketh.<s%>
The rich <S%H6223>man<s%> shall lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> but he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H622>gathered:<s%> he <S%H6491>openeth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and he is <S%H369>not.<s%>
Terrors <S%H1091><s%> take <S%H5381>hold<s%> on him as <S%H4325>waters,<s%> a <S%H5492>tempest<s%> stealeth him <S%H1589>away<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The east <S%H6921>wind<s%> carrieth him <S%H5375>away,<s%> and he <S%H1980>departeth:<s%> and as a storm <S%H8175>hurleth<s%> him out of his <S%H4480>place.<s%> <S%H4725><s%>
For God shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>spare:<s%> he would fain <S%H1272>flee<s%> <S%H1272><s%> out of his <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>
Men shall <S%H5606>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him, and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him out of his <S%H4480>place.<s%> <S%H4725><s%>
